column4: BRIEF-Asbury Automotive Group Announces 2018 First Quarter Financial Results

column4: BRIEF-Asbury Automotive Group Inc - First Quarter EPS Of $1.93 Per Diluted Share
column6: * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $1,609.2 MILLION VERSUS $1,551.7 MILLION
